column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/9f4976afe2568a6dd4a4026292e91697bedda4b6 for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
If we ever revamp the RPC interface, I'd suggest a stronger separation between modules, like /rpc/v$VERSION/{wallet/$WALLETNAME}, blockchain, network, misc}, for example.\n

@sipa In that case, this patch would break clients trying to use /rpc/v0/blah

Perhaps an alternative to / should be allowed within some criteria?
ACK. Tested with the python and curl examples on our JSON-RPC wiki page.\n
